verses.roman:
vraje tomāra saṅge yei sukha-āsvādana
sei sukha-samudrera ihāṅ nāhi eka kaṇa

synonyms: vraje—at Vṛndāvana; tomāra—of You; saṅge—in the company; yei—what; sukha-āsvādana—taste of transcendental bliss; sei—that; sukha-samudrera—of the ocean of transcendental bliss; ihāṅ—here, at Kurukṣetra; nāhi—there is not; eka—one; kaṇa—drop.
translation: "Here there is not even a drop of the ocean of transcendental happiness that I enjoyed with You in Vṛndāvana.
